name: Helior
aura: Increases Ally RES in All Battles by 60.

skills.desc:
Attacks 1 enemy. Increases this Champion’s DEF by 5% if this attack is critical (Stacks up to 20%).

Will also heal this Champion by 75% of their DEF after attacking if their DEF has already been increased by 20%.
skills.name: Sunshine Halberd
skills.books:
Level 2: Damage +5%
Level 3: Damage +5%
Level 4: Damage +5%
Level 5: Damage +10%

skills.desc: Attacks all enemies. Places a [Shield] buff on all allies for 2 turns equal to 20% of the damage inflicted.
skills.name: Solar Blessing
skills.books:
Level 2: Damage +5%
Level 3: Damage +5%
Level 4: Damage +10%
Level 5: Damage +10%
Level 6: Cooldown -1

skills.desc:
Transfers all debuffs from all allies to a target enemy, then attacks that enemy with the default skill.

Converts this Champion’s RES into additional ACC when using this skill.
skills.name: Harsh Light

skills.desc: Whenever an ally that has 2 or more debuffs is attacked, this Champion will absorb 30% of the damage inflicted on that ally.
skills.name: Intercessor [P]
